jd: From: Deepali Jha, SibiTalent deepali@sibitalent.com Reply to: deepali@sibitalent.com Hello,Hope you are doing well!!My name is Deepali Jha and I am a Staffing Specialist at Sibitalent. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our clients. Job Title:- AZURE cloud implementationVisa :: US Citizens, Green Card, or H4-EADLocation :: Middlesex County in (New Jersey onsite)Duration :: 12 months Need resume ASAP by TODAY itself. This is for a contract with the state organization of Middlesex County in New Jersey.they only want to see resumes with these exact certifications. If the candidate doesn’t have CERTIFICATION LISTED BELOW, PLEASE DO NOT SEND. Candidates should be local to New Jersey and you can send US Citizens, Green Card, OPT-EAD or H4-EAD. For Cloud Engineer : MCSE Cloud Platform Infrastructure Certification is a MUST for this role (Cert ID / Link is required)For Azure Data Engineer : MCSE Azure Data Engineer Certification is a MUST (Cert ID/Link is required) Thanks & RegardsDeepali JhaSr. Technical RecruiterE-Mail:deepali@sibitalent.comWebsite: www.sibitalent.com
